alchemy.effect: Doubles the potency of recovery items.

counter-attack.effect: Character strikes back automatically after physical attacks.

darkstrike.effect: Adds 100% Darkness to attacks and skills.

darktouch.effect: Adds 50% Darkness to attacks and skills.

deathstrike.effect: Adds 100% Death to attacks and skills.

deathtouch.effect: Adds 50% Death to attacks and skills.

distill ability.effect: Adds Distil Ability effect to attacks and skills.

distill mana.effect: Adds Distil Mana effect to attacks and skills.

distill power.effect: Adds Distil Power effect to attacks and skills.

distill speed.effect: Adds Distil Speed effect to attacks and skills.

double overdrive.effect: Charges Overdrive gauge at double speed.

evade and counter.effect: Evade physical attack and strike back automatically.

firestrike.effect: Adds Fire element to attacks and skills.

first strike.effect: Act first at beginning of battle.

half mp cost.effect: Reduces MP cost of spells and skills by half.

icestrike.effect: Adds Ice element to attacks and skills.

initiative.effect: Raises party's chances for a preemptive strike and eliminates ambushes, except enemys with a 100% ambush rate.

lightningstrike.effect: Adds Lightning element to attacks and skills.

magic +3%.effect: Increases damage of magical attacks by 3%.

magic +5%.effect: Increases damage of magical attacks by 5%.

magic +10%.effect: Increases damage of magical attacks by 10%.

magic +20%.effect: Increases damage of magical attacks by 20%.

magic booster.effect: Increases power of spells by 50%, but doubles their MP cost.

magic counter.effect: Strike back automatically after being attacked with magic.

no ap.effect: Character will gain no AP at the end of a battle.

one mp cost.effect: Reduces MP cost of spells and skills to 1.

overdrive -> ap.effect: Converts Overdrive gauge charge into AP.

piercing.effect: Attacks and skills ignore enemy's Armoured status.

poisonstrike.effect: Adds 100% Poison to attacks and skills.

poisontouch.effect: Adds 50% Poison to attacks and skills.

sensor.effect: View enemy data and elemental characteristics during battle.

silencestrike.effect: Adds 100% Silence to attacks and skills.

silencetouch.effect: Adds 50% Silence to attacks and skills.

sleepstrike.effect: Adds 100% Sleep to attacks and skills.

sleeptouch.effect: Adds 50% Sleep to attacks and skills.

slowstrike.effect: Adds 100% Slow to attacks and skills.

slowtouch.effect: Adds 50% Slow to attacks and skills.

sos overdrive.effect: Charges Overdrive gauge at double speed when HP drops below 50%.

stonestrike.effect: Adds 100% Petrification to attacks and skills.

stonetouch.effect: Adds 50% Petrification to attacks and skills.

strength +3%.effect: Increases damage of physical attacks by 3%.

strength +5%.effect: Increases damage of physical attacks by 5%.

strength +10%.effect: Increases damage of physical attacks by 10%.

strength +20%.effect: Increases damage of physical attacks by 20%.

triple overdrive.effect: Charges Overdrive gauge at triple speed.

waterstrike.effect: Adds Water element to attacks and skills.

zombiestrike.effect: Adds 100% Zombie to attacks and skills.

zombietouch.effect: Adds 50% Zombie to attacks and skills.
